text:
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/manual.html contains broken links. Among other links, the link to the license <URL:http://logging.apache.org/log4j/LICENSE> is broken.

Run the W3C Link Checker in order to get a list of broken or problematic links:
  http://validator.w3.org/checklink/checklink?uri=http%3A%2F%2Flogging.apache.org%2Flog4j%2F1.2%2Fmanual.html&hide_type=all&depth=&check=Check
creator: n-roeser@gmx.net
hoju@visi.com
text:
Fixed at revision: 1036829.  Thanks for reporting.

Note that I did not redeploy the website.  Changes won't be visible until that is done.
